::KitKat::

She looked at him as he took her hand. "Look, being stubborn has 
gottne me this far.  I've survived by my stubbornes. Besides, I'm not 
a bit, "she yawned,"tired." She chuckled slightly."Yeah, Perhaps your 
right. I could use a rest. OK, show me to my room, but you had better 
call me when the replicator is ready the the computer is done with 
the tests."  She let go of his hand and rubbed her eyes. "well, lead 
the way."

She had no idea he was hitting on her. Not that she was thst tired, 
but other than Drillbit, no bot showed that kind of attention.  Most 
bots she encountered would either fight with her or fight to kill her.
This was something new and she just didn't recognize the signs.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   Destructor had been working on the blasted machine for quite some 
time. He 
> suddenly shouted in sucess..."We have done it. Now I wish you to 
keep testing 
> this. Me and Kit Kat will test the final process in the morning. I 
dont want 
> her to be worried by this in her weakened stage." He walked into 
the 
> lab...."Kit Kat the replicators are in thier final cycle. I want 
you to get 
> some rest so we may test it in the morning with all our wits about 
us. " He 
> took her hand.."I have known you for a short time and yet you make 
me worry 
> by being so stubborn. Please , let me take you to your quaters for 
some 
> sleep."
